whatIs.title: What is PostMeAI?
whatIs.description: PostMeAI is a comprehensive AI-powered social media management platform designed to transform how content creators and businesses approach social media. Our platform combines cutting-edge artificial intelligence with intuitive design to automate content creation, optimize posting schedules, and maximize engagement across all major social networks.

items.0: AI-powered content generation that matches your unique voice and style
items.1: Automated posting schedules optimized for maximum engagement
items.2: Multi-platform content adaptation with platform-specific optimization
items.3: Advanced analytics to track performance and growth across all channels
items.4: Template system for consistent branding and recurring content themes

items.0: Brand-consistent content generation aligned with your marketing strategy
items.1: Team collaboration tools with role-based access and approval workflows
items.2: Enterprise-grade analytics with ROI tracking and performance insights
items.3: Custom API integrations for seamless workflow automation
items.4: White-label solutions for agencies and large-scale implementations

socialMedia.title: Social Media Platforms
socialMedia.subtitle: Connect and manage your social media accounts

items.0: Configure API keys for each platform you want to use
items.1: Test connections to verify your credentials are working
items.3: PostMeAI will automatically format content for each selected platform
items.4: Monitor connection status and troubleshoot any issues

socialMedia.apiKeyRequired: API key is required to test connection

pendentPosts.title: Pendent Posts to be Reviewed
pendentPosts.subtitle: Review and approve scheduled posts before they go live. Posts with "Review" execution mode require your approval.

noPosts.title: All Caught Up!
noPosts.description: No posts are currently waiting for your review.

editDialog.title: Edit Post Content
editDialog.description: Make changes to the post content before approval.

postApproved.title: Post Approved
postApproved.description: The post has been approved and will be published as scheduled.

postRejected.title: Post Rejected
postRejected.description: The post has been rejected and removed from the schedule.

postUpdated.title: Post Updated
postUpdated.description: The post content has been updated successfully.

documentation.title: PostMeAI Documentation
documentation.subtitle: Complete guide to using PostMeAI for social media content creation and management

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: PostMeAI is an AI-powered social media management platform that helps you create, optimize, and publish content across multiple platforms automatically.

aiContent.title: AI Content Generation
aiContent.description: Generate engaging posts automatically using advanced AI algorithms

multiPlatform.title: Multi-Platform Publishing
multiPlatform.description: Publish to 7+ social media platforms with platform-specific optimization

scheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
scheduling.description: Automate your posting schedule with intelligent timing

platforms.title: Supported Social Media Platforms
platforms.description: PostMeAI supports content creation and publishing for the following platforms:

featuresList.1: Execution modes: Review or Auto Post

templates.title: Template Management
featuresList: Save post configurations as reusable templates
schedulingList: Daily - Post every day at specified time

imageLibrary.title: Image Library Management
imageLibrary.description: Organize and manage your images with a comprehensive library system

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Follow these steps to start creating and publishing content with PostMeAI

steps.title: Configure Social Media Accounts
steps.description: Navigate to Social Media page and add your API keys for each platform you want to use.

steps.title: Upload Images (Optional)
steps.description: Go to Images page to upload and organize your visual content in folders.

steps.title: Create Your First Post
steps.description: Choose between AI-powered or manual post creation from the Post page.

steps.title: Review and Customize
steps.description: Review generated content and customize it for each platform before publishing.

steps.title: Publish or Schedule
steps.description: Publish immediately or save as a template for automated scheduling.

bestPractices.title: Best Practices
contentList: Keep subjects clear and specific for better AI results
Use appropriate text lengths for each platform
Include relevant links to drive traffic
Select high-quality images that match your content
schedulingList: Set up templates for consistent posting
Consider optimal posting times for your audience
Use review mode for important content
Organize images in meaningful folder structures
Monitor template performance and adjust as needed
